task: I have been responsible for managing, troubleshooting, and optimizing cloud infrastructure across AWS and Azure.
My role involved proactive monitoring, incident management, and CI/CD pipeline maintenance to ensure high availability and performance of cloud-hosted applications.
I worked closely with development and DevOps teams to streamline deployments, automate infrastructure, and enhance security postures using IAM, encryption, and logging mechanisms.
I played a key role in cost optimization by analyzing cloud resource utilization and suggesting scaling strategies.

With hands-on experience in Terraform, I contributed to infrastructure automation, reducing manual errors and deployment times. I also provided technical guidance and documentation to help teams adopt best practices for cloud security, networking, and DevOps workflows.
Worked as a part time developer during my under-graduate studies.
Delivering captivating UI designs and responsive front-end solutions.
Collaborated with clients, meeting design goals, and exceeding user expectations.
Extensive experience in modern web technologies, ensuring seamless user experiences.
